item.title: How to Start a Personal Blog With Hugo a Static Site Generator Written in Go (Part 1)
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Bartlomiej Mika)
item.description: The purpose of this article is to help you setup a personal blog as quickly as possible. These are the instructions and notes I’ve written down when setting up my site that I’d like to share.
